title: Implementing Linear Search in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will delve into the topic of JavaScript programming and explore various concepts related to it. Through this lab, you will gain hands-on experience in coding and learn how to implement various algorithms and techniques in JavaScript. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of JavaScript programming and be able to apply your skills to real-world applications.

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
